amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow military personnel and their dependents overseas to use their own funds to obtain abortion services in overseas military hospitals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 109-96 to lift the current ban on privately funded abortions at U.S. military facilities overseas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (CA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 233 (Roll no. 216).
